listing_by_id.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'conference' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name}); }

listing_by_name.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'conference' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.name,  {'id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name}); }
